unnormalised: Lights, Camera, Festival! Film buffs, get your popcorn ready! The festival season is upon us, and things are heating up faster than a plate of spicy biryani!
normalised: Lights, Camera, Festival! Film buffs, get your popcorn ready! The festival season is upon us, and things are heating up faster than a plate of spicy biryani!

unnormalised: From the back alleys of Bandra to the grand halls of Delhi, indie filmmakers and Bollywood bigwigs are gearing up to showcase their masterpieces. Word on the street is that the 25th Mumbai Film Festival is going to be HUGE, with a special focus on regional cinema this year.
normalised: From the back alleys of Bandra to the grand halls of Delhi, indie filmmakers and Bollywood bigwigs are gearing up to showcase their masterpieces. Word on the street is that the twenty fifth Mumbai Film Festival is going to be HUGE, with a special focus on regional cinema this year.

unnormalised: Think insightful documentaries, quirky shorts, and tear-jerking dramas. And don't forget the after-parties! Spotted: Kalki Koechlin prepping for her new film screening.
normalised: Think insightful documentaries, quirky shorts, and tear-jerking dramas. And don't forget the after-parties! Spotted: Kalki Koechlin prepping for her new film screening.

unnormalised: Plus, whispers about a retrospective on the legendary Satyajit Ray! Expect long queues and even longer standing ovations. And hey, if you're heading down south, keep an eye out for smaller, more intimate fests celebrating films inspired by Onam festivities.
normalised: Plus, whispers about a retrospective on the legendary Satyajit Ray! Expect long queues and even longer standing ovations. And hey, if you're heading down south, keep an eye out for smaller, more intimate fests celebrating films inspired by Onam festivities.

unnormalised: So, ditch that binge-watching session and get your dose of culture. Book your tickets now! Trust me, you don't want to miss this cinematic feast! Catch ya at the movies!
normalised: So, ditch that binge-watching session and get your dose of culture. Book your tickets now! Trust me, you don't want to miss this cinematic feast! Catch ya at the movies!
